item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, November 24, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Frosted Glass from Games to the Web: HTML glass UI inspired by AAA game dev (492 points | 106 comments)
2. Evidence of oldest known alphabetic writing unearthed in ancient Syrian city (291 points | 195 comments)
3. Bocker: Docker implemented in around 100 lines of Bash (2015) (291 points | 80 comments)
4. Which Power Plant Does My Electricity Come From? (94 points | 34 comments)
5. How to give a senior leader feedback without getting fired (284 points | 242 comments)
6. A 132-Year-Old Message in a Bottle in a Scottish Lighthouse (41 points | 22 comments)
7. Highest-resolution images ever captured of the sun’s surface (463 points | 125 comments)
8. The 'giant' river crabs that live beneath Rome's ancient ruins (6 points | 1 comment)
9. Deegen: A JIT-Capable VM Generator for Dynamic Languages (11 points | 2 comments)
10. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring Operations Coordinator ( | hide)
11. Antenna Diodes in the Pentium Processor (219 points | 32 comments)
12. Undersea Cables Connect the Global Internet (20 points | 7 comments)
13. 32k context length text embedding models (74 points | 24 comments)
14. Dear friend, you have built a Kubernetes (41 points | 20 comments)
15. Three hundred words you can spell on a calculator [pdf] (67 points | 27 comments)

18. Robot Jailbreak: Researchers Trick Bots into Dangerous Tasks (35 points | 10 comments)

20. Firefox DevTools Network Tab: How to filter requests by properties (76 points | 4 comments)
21. Using GPS in the Year 1565 (187 points | 29 comments)
22. Size and albedo of the largest detected Oort-cloud object (105 points | 44 comments)
23. How to Make an STM (Scanning Tunneling Microscope) [video] (10 points | discuss)
24. Stack Analyser: detect technologies used inside a repo (55 points | 9 comments)
25. Quake 3 Source Code Review: Network Model (2012) (310 points | 75 comments)
26. A century later, a taped message solves the mystery of a WWI doughboy's death (62 points | 38 comments)
27. A short introduction to Interval Tree Clocks (2017) (70 points | 19 comments)
28. Ice base melt revealed by multibeam imagery of an Antarctic ice shelf (98 points | 3 comments)
29. The remarkable life and astonishing times of Dwight Smith Young (40 points | 2 comments)
30. OpenMPTCProuter: Aggregate and encrypt multiple internet connections using MPTCP (151 points | 36 comments)
